definition: A statement or account that provides detailed information about someone or something, often used to convey characteristics, qualities, or features. It is commonly employed to depict or explain the appearance, nature, or attributes of a person, object, or event.

examples.german: Die Beschreibung des Unfalls war sehr detailliert.
examples.english: The description of the accident was very detailed.

examples.german: Kannst du mir eine kurze Beschreibung des Films geben?
examples.english: Can you give me a brief description of the movie?

examples.german: Die Beschreibung des Produkts auf der Website war irreführend.
examples.english: The description of the product on the website was misleading.

examples.german: Die Beschreibung des Gemäldes war in der Ausstellung nicht vorhanden.
examples.english: The description of the painting was not available in the exhibition.

examples.german: Die Beschreibung des Buches hat mein Interesse geweckt.
examples.english: The description of the book piqued my interest.
